# init(coder:)

**Initializer**

Creates a navigation item from data in an unarchiver.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init?(coder: NSCoder)
```

## Initializing an item

- **init(title:)**: Creates a navigation item with the specified title.

items.description: Creates a navigation item with the specified title.
items.name: init(title:)

title: init(coder:)
